# cook your dish here
for x in range(int(input())):
 n,k=input().strip(' ').split()
 n=int(n)
 k=int(k)
 if k==0:
  print(0,n)
 else:
  n=int(n)
  k=int(k)
  print(n//k,n%k)

# cook your dish here
for _ in range (int(input())):
 n,k=map(int,input().split())
 if k==0:
  print(0,n)
  continue
 r=n%k
 stu=(n-r)//k
 print(stu,r)

# cook your dish here
t=int(input())
while t>0:
 n,k=map(int,input().split())
 if k==0:
  print(0,n)
 else:
  c=n//k
  q=n%k
  print(c,q)
 t=t-1
